recipient_title: Position Title (e.g., Hiring Manager, HR Director)
subject: Application for [Position Title] Position
body: Opening paragraph: State the position you're applying for and where you found it. Include a brief statement about why you're interested and what makes you a strong candidate.
Second paragraph: Highlight your relevant experience and qualifications. Use specific examples and achievements that demonstrate your abilities. Connect your skills to the job requirements.

Third paragraph: Explain why you're interested in this specific company. Show that you've researched the organization and understand their mission, values, or recent accomplishments. Explain how you can contribute to their goals.

Closing paragraph: Express enthusiasm for the opportunity to interview. Thank them for their time and consideration. Include a call to action (e.g., 'I look forward to discussing how I can contribute to your team').
